content.text:
# List of awards and nominations received by Becky G

}}
American singer and actress Becky G has received many awards and nominations throughout her career.
In 2017 and 2018, Gomez released a series of commercial success singles and collaborations, including "Mayores" and "Sin Pijama". "Mayores" was nominated for Top Latin Song at the Billboard Music Awards, and won Song of the Year at the Latin American Music Awards, at the 2019 ceremony, the song "Sin Pijama" won two categories Urban Collaboration of the Year and Urban Song of the Year. Gomez was honored as one of the Leading Ladies of Entertainment by The Latin Recording Academy in 2018. In 2019, Gomez released her debut studio album, Mala Santa, and was awarded the Extraordinary Evolution Award for her evolving work in a short span of years. Her commercial success single, "Mamiii", which got five nominations at the Billboard Latin Music Awards, winning Song of the Year at the Latin American Music Awards, and won for Latin Pop/Reggaeton Song of the Year at the iHeartRadio Music Awards. Her second studio album, Esquemas was nominated for Latin Pop Album of the Year at the Billboard Latin Music Awards, and received Album of the Year nominations from the Latin American Music Awards and Lo Nuestro Awards award ceremonies. For her work on Christina Aguilera's studio album, Aguilera, as featured artist on "Pa Mis Muchachas", she was nominated for Album of the Year at the 23rd Annual Latin Grammy Awards. In 2023, she received the Impact Award at the Billboard Women in Music event. Her third studio album, Esquinas, was nominated for Album of the Year at the Premio Lo Nuestro. The song "Por el Contrario" which was nominated for Best Regional Mexican Song at the Latin Grammy Awards, and won for Mariachi/Ranchera Song of the Year at the Premio Lo Nuestro.
